articles.title: Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of South Sudan
articles.content:
Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of South Sudan
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Deng Alor Kuol upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of the Republic of South Sudan.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him success in his new work.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Recent Remark about "Unification of Social Systems"
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Remark about "Unification of Social Systems"
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- On April 29 traitor Park Geun Hye invited Scaparrotti, commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea, to her office in Chongwadae to pin a decoration on his chest and reeled off sophism that the situation due to the north's continued nuclear and missile threats should be used for making an opportunity for laying a groundwork for opening the era of denuclearization and unification.
					The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Thursday made public information bulletin No. 1105 which denounced this as a vicious solicitation of the confrontation-minded woman for keeping the "sanctions" and pressure on the DPRK with the backing of her master U.S.
					
					Though the U.S. and its followers made desperate efforts to isolate and stifle the DPRK through their unprecedentedly harsh "sanctions" and the largest-ever nuclear war drills against the DPRK, this only resulted in augmenting the latter's political and military might and making remarkable successes in economic construction to startle the world, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					In utter ignorance of this, Park kowtowed to her master U.S., asking for stifling the compatriots in a bid to carry out her wild dream of "unification of social systems". It is quite natural that Park, being such a bete noire, is ridiculed and cursed by the people.
					
					Her talking about "groundwork for unification" is nothing but a foolish remark of a stupid who is more dead than alive as she is facing a miserable end after being severely punished by the nation for her hideous crimes.
					
					Her preposterous and ridiculous daydream for "unification of social systems" will be a dagger cutting off her windpipe before long, the information bulletin warned.

articles.title: DPRK Trade Unions Send Affirmative Reply to S. Korean Trade Unions' Proposal for Joint Football Games
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued new stamp (one sheetlet) on the occasion of the 80th founding anniversary of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF).
					 Printed on the upper part of the sheetlet portraying a picture of President Kim Il Sung who declared the founding of the ARF at the Tongjiang meeting on May 5, Juche 25 (1936) are letters "80th Anniversary of ARF," "Juche 25 (1936)" and "Juche 105 (2016)."

articles.title: Home-visiting Groups of Chongryon Leave
articles.content:
Home-visiting Groups of Chongryon Leave
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of activists of the Korean Youth League in Japan of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) headed by Jo Myong Jin, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the youth league, and a home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan headed by Ri Su Nam, vice-chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, left here on Thursday.

articles.title: IIJI Delegation Here
articles.content:
IIJI Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) led by Secretary General Kenichi Ogami arrived here Thursday in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 The members of the congratulatory groups paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They looked round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Participants in WPK Seventh Congress Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in WPK Seventh Congress Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid wreaths and bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 They visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum and looked round historical relics preserved at the old home. 
					
					 They also toured the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Youth Movement Museum, the Sci-Tech Complex and the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from IIJI and Japanese Organization
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from IIJI and Japanese Organization
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent by the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues of the great leaders by the members of the IIJI delegation on a visit to the DPRK on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Thursday by Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, who is leading a delegation of the IIJI on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Event "International Academic Exchange for Peace and Development" Held
articles.content:
Event "International Academic Exchange for Peace and Development" Held
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The event "International Academic Exchange for Peace and Development" was held in Pyongyang from May 2 to 5 under the joint auspices of the National Peace Committee of Korea and the International Peace Foundation on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the foundation of Kim Il Sung University.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Chairwoman of the National Peace Committee of Korea Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Thae Hyong Chol, president of the university and minister of Higher Education, officials, teachers and students of several universities, a delegation of the International Peace Foundation headed by Chairman of its Advisory Board Alfred, prince of the Liechtenstein Principality, diplomatic envoys and members of foreign embassies here and foreign correspondents.
					
					 There took place round-table talks and academic exchanges between teachers and students of the relevant universities and the members of the delegation of the International Peace Foundation at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Pyongyang University of Science and Technology in the period of the event.
					
					 Introduced there were discoveries and inventions which were recorded in the history of civilization and their scientific significance and exchanged there were successes and experience made in the fields of economics, chemistry and medicine.

articles.title: Association for Restoration of Fatherland
articles.content:
Association for Restoration of Fatherland
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 80th anniversary of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland founded by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 On this occasion, the Korean people are recollecting with deep emotion the feats the President performed for the liberation of the country by rallying people of all strata in the idea of national independence and great national unity.
					
					 After creating the immortal Juche idea in the early period of the Korean revolution, Kim Il Sung had regarded it as a guarantee for the victory in the revolution to prepare the driving force of the revolution through the unity of the whole nation.
					
					 He convened the Nanhutou Meeting on February 27, 1936 to put forward a policy on creating a permanent united front organization and expanding the anti-Japanese national united front movement on a nationwide scale in close relationship with the anti-Japanese armed struggle. 
					
					 He pushed ahead with preparations to materialize the policy, and, on this basis, founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland on May 5, 1936.
					
					 The association was an integrated united front body with regular organizational system embracing all anti-Japanese patriotic forces as well as an underground revolutionary organization which promoted the anti-Japanese struggle for national liberation.
					
					 It developed into a pan-national organization in a short span of time, having hundreds of thousands of members in different parts of not only the homeland but also Manchuria of China and Japan.
					
					 Included in the organization were workers, peasants, students, intellects, small or medium merchants and manufacturers, nationalists and patriotic-minded religionists.
					
					 The association was the first genuine national united front body in the history of the Korean people's anti-Japanese struggle for national liberation.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- During the 70-day campaign, scientists and technicians in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea made a lot of sci-tech achievements conducive to strengthening the country's self-supporting economy and improving the people's livelihood.
					 The Mechanical Engineering Institute under the State Academy of Sciences completed designing 10-odd kinds of machines only in 10 days and realized the home manufacture of equipment for producing bulking food as well as automatic terrapin-hatching machine.
					
					 The Bioengineering Branch bred new high-yielding strains of crops and the City Management Research Institute made a new compound lagging with wastes to put its production on an industrial basis.
					
					 The Academy of Sports Science completed an advanced analysis method helpful to maintaining the best health conditions among sportspersons, and a new antiviral agent was developed by medical scientists.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians and the April 15 Technical Innovation Shock Brigade settled many scientific problems arising in practice. 
					
					 Their achievements include the introduction of embryo transfer method by abdominal endoscope to raise the production of kids, the improvement of tractors' performance and the mainly established information system for forest resources management.

articles.title: Strong Low Pressure Hit DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK Affected by Strong Low Pressure
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Heavy rainfall and strong wind, caused by strong low pressure which passed through the northern part of the West Sea of Korea, hit the most parts of the west coastal area and Kangwon Province of the DPRK on May 2-4.
					 The speed of wind registered 28 meters per second in Ryonggang County, Nampho City, 22 in Ryongyon County, South Hwanghae Province, 21 in Namyang Workers' District in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province and 20 in Kumchon County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 From 11:00 Monday to 5:00 Wednesday, it rained 125 mm, 124 mm, 116 mm, 113 mm, 111 mm and 117 mm in Sonchon, Tongchang, Uiju, Tongrim and Chonma counties and Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province respectively, 113 mm in Sinphyong County, North Hwanghae Province and 111 mm in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Meanwhile, tidal wave hit the coastal areas of North Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Korean-style Socialism Is Ever-victorious: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean-style Socialism Is Ever-victorious: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an article to the 25th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish".
					 The work, published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991), deals with the inevitability of victory of socialism, secret of solidity and invincibility of Korean socialism and its intrinsic nature.
					
					 Noting that Korean-style socialism has stood firm despite all severe adversities and the popular character of Korean-style socialism in which everything serves the people has been fully demonstrated for more than two decades since the publication of the work, the article goes on:
					
					 Korean-style socialism has advanced along the road of victory without vacillation despite the anti-socialist moves of the imperialists and worked such historic miracles as bringing about epoch-making changes in all fields of politics, military, economy and culture, weathering the worst trials thanks to the strong ideological mainstay called the Juche idea.
					
					 All the people united close around the leader in thinking and purpose, morality and sense of obligation and the whole society forms a great family in which all of them help and lead each other forward. This single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses is the character peculiar to Korean-style socialism hard to find in any other part of the world and the source of inexhaustible strength.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is the life and soul of the people and the cradle of genuine life and happiness because under this system everything truly serves the people, giving the top priority to their interests. 
					
					 The present refugee crisis sweeping the world proves that any illusion about capitalism and choice of its path lead to self-destruction and the ideal and wishes of the popular masses can be translated into brilliant realities only under the socialist system.

articles.title: U.S. "Strategic Patience" Policy towards DPRK Has Gone Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. "Strategic Patience" Policy towards DPRK Has Gone Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. scenario in which it made desperate efforts to deny and play down the powerful nuclear strike capability of the DPRK at any cost has proven unworkable, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Quoting the French broadcasting service RFI, News Week, CNN and Financial Times, etc. as reporting that the DPRK has emerged a nuclear power in name and reality, the article says:
					
					 In the past days the Western media gradually became vocal recognizing the status of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state but it is the first time that such view has grown as strong as this time.
					
					 This objectively proves that the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK has gone totally bust.
					
					 The U.S. has ratcheted up its nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK, blustering that it would neither recognize nor tolerate the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 In reaction to this, the DPRK successfully conducted an H-bomb test early this year, demonstrating the might of a nuclear power. It, at the same time, clearly showed the U.S. and other hostile forces what tremendous nuclear strike capability of Juche the DPRK had.
					
					 The U.S. "engagement policy" to prevent the DPRK from going nuclear and its "strategic patience" policy of denying the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and forcing it to dismantle the nukes have all proven bankrupt.
					
					 The world is aware that the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail are not almighty and its propaganda is not true.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in the nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK, far from drawing a bitter lesson from the changed situation, it is left with no option but to steadily bolster up its nuclear strike capability.

articles.title: Suicide Case Occurs in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Suicide Case Occurs in S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Another suicide case occurred in the south Korean puppet army, according to south Korean MBC.
					 A soldier of a unit of the puppet army committed a suicide by hanging himself on a tree on a nearby hill in Hwachon County, Kangwon Province of south Korea at the end of April.

articles.title: Protest Actions against U.S. Embassy Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Actions against U.S. Embassy Unabated in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea staged a protest action against the U.S. embassy in Seoul Monday, according to south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo.
					 They demanded the immediate pullback of U.S. forces from south Korea, declaring that they could no longer allow any war exercise bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They urged the sycophantic and bellicose Park Geun Hye regime to step down at once in response to the will of the people manifested in the recent general election.
					
					 The Korea Solidarity has waged similar actions 18 times but the Park regime hurled police forces into brutal suppression of them at all times, they noted.
					
					 On the same day the fascist riot police brutally cracked down upon the protesters and walked them off to a police station.
					
					 It is said that they are offering resistance through silence and hunger strike in demand of the freedom of expression and the release of all those arrested.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Exposes Danger of "Anti-Terrorism Law"
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Exposes Danger of "Anti-Terrorism Law"
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "Human Rights Committee" exposed the danger of the "anti-terrorism law" to be enforced by the puppet authorities, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on May 2.
					Recently the puppet authorities set forth the "enforcement ordinance" of the "anti-terrorism law" which calls upon the minister of Foreign Affairs, the minister of Land and Transportation and the director of the Agency of People's Security to set up the headquarters for measures against terrorist cases and exercise the right of the bosses of the headquarters according to the nature of terrorist acts.
					
					It also calls on the puppet military to hurl special ops forces into the areas outside military facilities to carry out anti-terrorist operations in case they are required by the bosses of the headquarters.
					
					This proves that the puppet authorities are mulling hurling military force into suppressing even the slightest anti-"government" moves including the people's action for vital rights under the pretext of the "anti-terrorism law".

articles.title: S. Korean Inhabitants Praise Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
S. Korean Inhabitants Praise Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- An inhabitant of south Korea posted on his website articles praising the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, expressing his boundless reverence for them, according to Yonhap News of south Korea on Tuesday.
					 He posted on the website "Matanggou Camp" set up by his name the contents of "With the Century", the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, from May last year to March this year in total of 156 installments.
					
					 He also post works of Marshal Kim Jong Un, an article titled "Invincible is the cause of the party of great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" and documents such as "Juche Philosophy" and "Tradition and History".
					
					 As an operator and member of various websites including "Correctly Understanding DPRK" from 2009, he has posted articles praising and disseminating the advantageous social system of the DPRK.
					
					 In December 2011 when leader Kim Jong Il passed away, he set up on his website a cyber incense-burning altar to the memory of Kim Jong Il and devoted articles praising his greatness.
					
					 A reverend of the Samyang Church in Ryangsan City, South Kyongsang Province posted on the website an article titled "The world should look up to Kim Jong Un's Korea" and articles praising the Juche idea and Songun politics, touching the heartstrings of people.

articles.title: Certificates of Exploits to Great Men of Mt. Paektu from Bangladeshi Party
articles.content:
Certificates of Exploits to Great Men of Mt. Paektu from Bangladeshi Party
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un received certificates of exploits from the Bangladesh Jatiya Party in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A ceremony of conveying the certificates took place in Dakha on April 24.
					
					 Present there were members of the leadership of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party and the ambassador and staff member of the DPRK embassy in Dakha.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the picture of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The certificates were handed to the DPRK ambassador by the secretary general of the party.

articles.title: Seminars for Celebrating WPK Seventh Congress Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars for Celebrating WPK Seventh Congress Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Benin, Spain and Malaysia on April 28 and 30 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said in his report:
					
					 The WPK is the party which formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK, strongest weapon more powerful than nuclear weapon, draws the admiration of the people.
					
					 The foundation of the single-minded unity lies in the popular policies pursued by the WPK.
					
					 The WPK regards it as the supreme principle to defend the interests of the people and improve the people's living standard.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers noted that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung was steadily developed by its eternal General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Stating that the future of the DPRK is rosy as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, they hoped for the success of the WPK Seventh Congress.
					
					 The general director of a Malaysian company said that the exploits President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il performed in building and leading the party would be immortal with the history of the WPK.

articles.title: Meetings for Congratulating WPK Seventh Congress Held Abroad
articles.content:
Meetings for Congratulating WPK Seventh Congress Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Meetings for congratulating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place in Russia, Germany and Angola on April 28 and 29.
					 Present there were figures of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Communist Party of Germany, the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, the Angolan newspaper Eme and the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples and masses.
					
					 The acting first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the WPK had won victories for a long period under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that it is hard to find such an invincible party strongly supported by the popular masses as the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Germany said that the WPK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un steers the Korean people to the building of a thriving socialist nation while overcoming all sorts of difficulties by dint of Songun.
					
					 The director of the Public Education Department of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples warmly congratulated the WPK Seventh Congress which would become a historic turning point in carrying out the Korean people's cause of socialism.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Russia.

articles.title: Socialist Korea Will Be Ever-Victorious Thanks to WPK: Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Socialist Korea Will Be Ever-Victorious Thanks to WPK: Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Will of the Workers' Party of Korea" on its website on April 25 on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The article said:
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held.
					
					 The WPK founded on Oct. 10, 1945 has led the DPRK to the road of socialism, weathering all sorts of challenges and trials of history.
					
					 It is the firm faith and will of the WPK to accomplish the cause of the popular masses for independence and socialism to the end.
					
					 The 70-odd years of the WPK proves this.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of socialism is being carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people came to regard socialism as their life and soul through their experience and fully realized that the road of following the WPK only guarantees victory and glory.
					
					 Socialist Korea will be ever-victorious thanks to the WPK full of indomitable faith and will.

articles.title: WPK Will Achieve Brilliant Successes: Thai Figure
articles.content:
WPK Will Achieve Brilliant Successes: Thai Figure
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- I am convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) would achieve more shining successes under the leadership of the respected HE Kim Jong Un, paying high tribute to the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il on the occasion of 7th Congress of the WPK.
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, said this in a statement on April 30.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The WPK has recorded the proud history in which it has led the country and people to victory for more than 70 years since its founding.
					
					 It has pursued the policy of loving care and trust in the popular masses by regarding the Juche idea founded by HE Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by General Secretary Kim Jong Il as its guidelines.
					
					 The DPRK is now fully demonstrating its might as the politico-ideological and military power, nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturing and launching state under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 That the WPK has made the brilliant success and miracle would be unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK and eternal President of the DPRK, and Kim Jong Il, the eternal general secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Denounces U.S. and Its Followers for Their Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Denounces U.S. and Its Followers for Their Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article accusing the U.S. and its followers of their moves for stifling the DPRK on its website on April 27.
					 That the U.S. and other hostile forces are talking about what they called the DPRK's "violation of international law and the UN resolutions" is the far-fetched abuses by those ignorant of the basis and essence of the international political order, the article said.
					
					 It noted that it is just the DPRK which has sincerely abided by international law and the basic spirit of the UN Charter from the most steadfast internationalist stand while consistently adhering to its foreign policy tenet of independence, peace and friendship after its founding.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 However, the U.S. and its followers are branding the DPRK as the "rogue state" and "abnormal state" which are unpardonable in the international community while letting loose a string of unreasonable remarks that the latter is "ignoring" international law and the UN "resolutions" and "blatantly violating" them.
					
					 The abnormal state, gangster-like state and rogue state are none other than the U.S. and its followers who have reduced the world into the place ruled by jungle law in defiance of international law and treaties on equality for all and international peace.
					
					 The groups of evils who are bringing only disaster and misfortune to mankind should properly understand that they are bound to meet the punishment of retaliation and justice.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Body Blasts Japanese Authorities for Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Body Blasts Japanese Authorities for Suppressing Chongryon
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee issued a statement on April 20 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 In recent days the Japanese authorities are working hard to crack down on Chongryon, the legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK, while frantically conducting the hostile moves against the DPRK with the mobilization of all state power.
					
					 Today in Japan the sentiment against the Koreans in which Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are discriminated and rejected is being created due to the Japanese authorities' hostile policy toward the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 We strongly urge the Japanese authorities to stop all sorts of hostile moves against the DPRK and Chongryon, resolutely denouncing the politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan which is being openly committed.
					
					 We will support the Korean people in their just cause of defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and wage a dynamic struggle against the Japanese reactionaries' unethical acts.

articles.title: French Organization Protests against UNSC
articles.content:
French Organization Protests against UNSC
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association sent a letter to the UN Security Council following the U.S. moves for stifling the DPRK on April 19.
					 The letter branded the UNSC's fabrication of the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK under the pressure of the U.S. as the act of escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and a violation of the UN Charter.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are a clear threat to peace as they create tension and dispute.
					
					 It is very regretful that the UNSC did not bring the above-said joint military drills, practical issue, up for discussion and took no measure.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea, arch criminals who are escalating military tension with the DPRK, are impudently talking about "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The UNSC is violating the UN Charter by shunning the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills, clear threat to peace, far from taking issue with them.

articles.title: British Political Party, Organizations Release Press Statements
articles.content:
British Political Party, Organizations Release Press Statements 
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) released a press statement on April 29 as regard the opening of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The press statement referred to the contents of the decision made by the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, saying that the bureau decided to hold the 7th Congress of the WPK in Pyongyang on May 6.
					
					 It stressed that the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) is convinced that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger with the 7th Congress of the WPK as a momentum.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Korean Friendship Association UK and the British preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu released a joint press statement informing the decision made by the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Ilusion vana de Park Geun-hye sera punal para cortarle vida, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
Ilusion vana de Park Geun-hye sera punal para cortarle vida, advierte CRPP
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- El 29 de abril, la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye invito a Chongwadae al comandante de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea para otorgarle una orden, ocasion en la cual maldijo que "es necesario convertir el estado permanente de amenaza nuclear y de misil del Norte de Corea en la oportunidad necesaria a asentar el fundamento para lograr la desnuclearizacion y abrir la era de unificacion". 
					El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP), en la informacion no. 1105 fechada 5, lo califica de solicitud pueril de la maniaca conflictiva para mantener de continuo la "sancion" y la "presion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo el amparo de su amo norteamericano, y continua:
					
					Estados Unidos y sus satelites libraron el alboroto de "sancion" y los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de mayor envergadura a fin de asilar y asfixiar a la RPDC, pero, se ha centuplicado su poderio politico y militar y se han alcanzado exitos vertiginosos en su construccion de la potencia economica admirando a todo el mundo. 
					
					Sin embargo, la traidora Park Geun-hye implora a su amo norteamericano a aplastar a la parte connacional abrigando la ilusion vana de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" sin saber nada de la situacion. 
					
					Pues, es natural que esta escoria se haga objeto de repudio de todo el mundo. 
					
					En particular, es muy ridicula la insistencia en el "fundamento de unificacion" de la traidora Park que esta en visperas del fin tragico despues de haber recibido el castigo de toda la nacion por sus crimenes irreparables. 
					
					La ilusion vana de la traidora Park de lograr la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" sera un punal para cortarle la vida en un futuro cercano.

articles.title: Entidades extranjeras envian cestos de flores ante estatuas de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Entidades extranjeras envian cestos de flores ante estatuas de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche y el Consejo Nacional de Enlace de Estudio del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo de Japon enviaron cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu.
					Los cestos de flores fueron depositados hoy ante las estatuas de bronce de los grandes Lideres por los miembros de la delegacion del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, de visita en Corea.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto "Intercambio Academico Internacional por Paz y el Desarrollo"
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto "Intercambio Academico Internacional por Paz y el Desarrollo"
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, tuvo lugar del dia 2 al 5 en esta capital el acto "Intercambio Academico Internacional por la Paz y el Desarrollo" bajo coauspicios del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz y la Fundacion Internacional de Paz. 
					En la ceremonia de inauguracion estuvieron presentes la presidenta del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz y del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el rector de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, Thae Hyong Chol, los funcionarios, profesores y estudiantes de varias universidades, la delegacion de la Fundacion Internacional de Paz encabezada por el presidente del Consejo Consultivo y principe de  Liechtenstein, Alfred, los representantes diplomaticos y miembros de embajadas de varios paises acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y reporteros extranjeros. 
					
					En el periodo del certamen se realizaron en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y la Universidad de Ciencias y Tecnicas de Pyongyang las charlas e intercambios academicos entre los profesores y estudiantes de respectivos planteles docentes y los miembros de la delegacion de la Fundacion Internacional de Paz. 
					
					En las ocasiones se presentaron los descubrimientos e invenciones, que dejaron notables huellas en la historia de civilizacion humana, y sus importancias academicas, y se intercambiaron los exitos y las experiencias logrados en los dominios de la economia, la quimica y la medicina.

articles.title: Caen muchas lluvias en RPDC
articles.content:
Caen muchas lluvias en RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- Debido a la fuerte depresion atmosferica pasada desde el dia 2 hasta el 4 por la parte norte del Mar Oeste de Corea, soplaba permanentemente un fuerte viento y cayo una gran cantidad de lluvias en la mayoria de zonas costeras occidentales y la provincia de Kangwon.
					 El anemometro marco 28m/s en el distrito de Ryonggang de la ciudad de Nampho, 22m/s en el distrito de Ryongyon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, 21m/s en el poblado obrero de Namyang del distrito de Sukchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y 20m/s en el distrito de Kumchon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					
					  Entre las regiones donde cayeron entre las 11 del dia 2 y las 5 del 4 mas de 100mm de lluvias, figuran el distrito de Sonchon (125mm), el de Tongchang (124mm), la ciudad de Sinuiju (117mm), el distrito de Uiju (116mm), el de Tongrim (113mm) y el de Chonma (111mm), de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, el distrito de Sinphyong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte (113mm) y la ciudad de Haeju de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur (111mm).
					
					  Por otra parte, hubo marejadas en las zonas costeras de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
